Articles.Content:
Hello all. I'm new to the forums, but have had the game for a couple of months now. I just wanted to post here, my appreciation to the very small dev team of this gem of a game. I have been plugging this game on the Steam forums whenever possible without spamming. You can credit my purchase to KurtJMac of Youtube, whose videos prompted me to buy it. To those who haven't seen his KSP series, I'd highly recommend looking into it is as well as Scott Manley's videos. I've been having a literal blast with this game. I hope to become skilled enough one day to lose my training wheels (MechJeb) and explore the cosmos which has been greatly expanded in the latest patch. I thank you for this wonderful game and look forward to its future. It is truly the best 18 bucks I've ever spent.

Edited September 26, 2012 by Moeceefus

Hi Moeceefus, welcome to the community

Glad you are having fun, also, manual flight is a decent skill to have, MechJeb does not always get things right

Thank you. So far, I'm pretty good at getting into orbit and circularizing unassisted. I can also inject myself to to the Mun and Minmus. I generally only use MechJeb for landings. I have yet to try for the new planets and moons and I've noticed MechJeb doesn't have the new stuff on its transfer list yet, or am I missing an update? My understanding of astrophysics is extremely limited, if any, and MechJeb helps me learn the angles and burn times to get to new places.
